name: silky-gs
description: A hardware abstraction layer runtime for porting NES games to the Apple IIgs

scripts.build:all: npm run build:smb && npm run build:bf && npm run build:wump && npm run build:lo && npm run build:ic && npm run build:eb && npm run build:dk
scripts.debug:smb: cd src/games/smb && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% SuperMarioGS -source SuperMarioGS_S02__Output.txt SuperMarioGS_S03__Output.txt SuperMarioGS_S04__Output.txt SuperMarioGS_S05__Output.txt SuperMarioGS_S06__Output.txt -map SMB.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer
scripts.debug:bf: cd src/games/bf && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% BalloonFgtGS -source BalloonFgtGS_S02__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S03__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S04__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S05__Output.txt BalloonFgtGS_S06__Output.txt -map BF.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer
scripts.debug:lo: cd src/games/lightsout && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% LightsOutGS -source LightsOutGS_S02__Output.txt LightsOutGS_S03__Output.txt LightsOutGS_S04__Output.txt LightsOutGS_S05__Output.txt LightsOutGS_S06__Output.txt -map Master.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer
scripts.debug:wump: cd src/games/wumpus && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% WumpusGS -source WumpusGS_S02__Output.txt WumpusGS_S03__Output.txt WumpusGS_S04__Output.txt WumpusGS_S05__Output.txt -map Wump.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer
scripts.debug:eb: cd src/games/excitebike && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% ExciteBikeGS -source ExciteBikeGS_S02__Output.txt ExciteBikeGS_S03__Output.txt ExciteBikeGS_S04__Output.txt ExciteBikeGS_S05__Output.txt -map Master.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer
scripts.debug:dk: cd src/games/dk && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% DonkeyKongGS -source DonkeyKongGS_S02__Output.txt DonkeyKongGS_S03__Output.txt DonkeyKongGS_S04__Output.txt DonkeyKongGS_S05__Output.txt -map Master.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer
scripts.debug:ic: cd src/games/iceclimber && %npm_package_config_crossrunner% IceClimberGS -source IceClimberGS_S02__Output.txt IceClimberGS_S03__Output.txt IceClimberGS_S04__Output.txt IceClimberGS_S05__Output.txt -map Master.s -Debug -CompatibilityLayer

author: Lucas Scharenbroich
